description: This waymarked circular walk explores the countryside to the west of the village of Ash Priors in the district of Taunton Deane, Somerset. There's a public car park near to Ash Priors Common where you can start the walk. The trails will then take you past Denbury Wood and Homelea Farm with some pleasant country and woodland views. You can extend the walk by strolling around the pleasant village of Ash Priors and its associated common. Head north and you could also pick up the West Deane Way .
